ti:edition.ti:label: Ἐγχειρίδιον
ti:edition.ti:description: Epictetus. Epicteti dissertationes ab Arriano digestae, editio maior. Schenkl, Heinrich. editor. Leipzig: Teubner, 1916.

ti:translation.ti:label: The Encheiridion, or Manual
ti:translation.ti:description: Epictetus. The Discourses of Epictetus, with the Encheridion and Fragments. Long, George, translator. London: George Bell and Sons, 1887.

ti:translation.ti:label: The Enchiridion
